sentences.sentence: They will not be called combat brigades.
sentences.translation: 他们不会被叫做战斗旅。

sentences.sentence: That is why I ordered the removal of our combat brigades by next August.
sentences.translation: 这就是我下令在明年8月前撤走我们的作战旅的原因。

sentences.sentence: Small logging brigades of some four men, with the help of trucks, are behind most illegal felling.
sentences.translation: 装备卡车的小型的四人工作旅就是这种非法活动的幕后推手。
